wikipedia_page.main: Reg Spencer (1 December 1908 – 16 March 1981) was an English footballer who played as a left half for Tranmere Rovers. He made 261 appearances for Tranmere, scoring 3 goals.

response: 16 March 1981: Reg Spencer, 72, played 261 games at left-half for his only club Tranmere Rovers in the 1930s.
